original_title: Puttalam MP Ali Sabri Raheem nabbed with gold at BIA
original_body_lines: Puttalam District All Ceylon Makkal Congress MP Ali Sabri Raheem has been taken into custody by Customs along with a stock of gold at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA).
It was reported that the MP who returned to Sri Lanka from abroad was detained by the customs officials at the BIA with 3.5 kilos of gold.
